label: DMMZ1
description: Dome Battery powered Z-Wave Plus enabled mousetrap

2.label: Basic_Set
2.description: The Mouser sends a Basic Set command to Association Group 2 (or the Control Group) to directly trigger devices (like a light, chime, etc.) when it is tripped.

3.label: Notification_Report
3.description: Send a Notification Report when tripped, reset, armed, and disarmed.

4.label: Sensor_Binary_Report
4.description: Group 4 supports up to 5 members and the Mouser sends it a SENSOR_BINARY_REPORT when tripped, reset, armed, and disarmed.

1.label: BASIC_SET Level
1.description: Sets the value sent by the BASIC_SET command to Association Group 2

2.label: Set Firing Mode
2.description: This parameter sets the “firing mode” of the Mouser.

3.label: High Voltage Duration Time
3.description: How long the Mouser will fire continuously before it starts to burst-fire

4.label: Enable/Disable LED Alarm
4.description: Enables or disables the indicator LED alarm when the trap is tripped

5.label: LED Alarm Duration
5.description: Sets the amount of time the LED Indicator blinks after the trap is tripped
